creditline: The Walter C. and Mary C. Briggs Trust Fund
description: round stained glass panel depicting the Annunciation, with kneeling Mary at prayer at one side and an angel in red at the other side, holding a scroll; white flowers in a vase behind Mary; wave or scroll patterned border
object_name: Stained glass roundel, from a set of five
text: Designed by Albrecht Dürer's student Hans Schäufelein, this set of roundels depicts five crucial moments from the life of Jesus: the Annunciation of his birth to his mother; his mother Mary praying to him after his birth; the Adoration of the Magi; Christ's Resurrection; and Jesus as the Judge at the Last Judgment. Acquisition of these beautiful panels from the German Renaissance significantly strengthens the Mia’s collection of stained glass.
title: The Annunciation
